product1.html:
MEGMEET Inverter Welding Machine Model Ehave CM 500H/500/400/350/250

  • Smart CO2 / MAG / MMA welding machine for heavy and light work
  • Used for welding various types of carbon steel in industries such as rail transport, automotive, shipbuilding, steel structures, machinery, hardware, metal, etc.
  • Excellent gap welding capability and reduced wire sticking sensation
  • Quickly set welding parameters and expand functions on the control panel without any hassle
  • Can be connected to a ROBOT for automatic welding, designed for direct use with robots

product6.name: Aluminum Stainless Welding Machine
product6.description: Rilon TIG250P AC/DC aluminum welding machine with TIG and ARC welding modes. It operates on 220V electricity and delivers 250A using the MOSFET system. It is ideal for welding aluminum and provides clean, beautiful weld beads. The machine includes automatic frequency adjustment and an automatic welding bead creation system. It can be used to weld stainless steel, brass, copper, etc. The system offers 2T/4T functionality, Pulse frequency and width, Down-Slope, Post Flow, and AC Balance to ensure stable and consistent welding. It's easy to transport and suitable for continuous welding. It comes with a full set of accessories, including a WP26 argon welding cable (5m), 3m electric welding cable, 3m ground cable, automatic light-adjusting welding helmet, and more.

product6.html:
Rilon TIG250P AC/DC Argon Welding Machine

Rilon TIG250P AC/DC argon welding machine with MOSFET system, providing 250A power, operating at 220V. It supports both TIG and ARC welding, ideal for welding aluminum with clean and beautiful welds. It also includes automatic frequency control and an automatic weld bead creation system. Suitable for welding stainless steel, brass, copper, and more. Features 2T/4T operation, pulse frequency and width, down-slope, post-flow, and AC balance for optimal weld quality.

Rilon TIG250P AC/DC

Argon welding machine (220V 1Phase MOSFET) for TIG / MMA welding.

product12.name: Welding Machine Spare Parts
product12.description: Authorized distributor for Argon welding machines with TIG and MMA functionality. Compact and portable, adjustable voltage, and includes a 5m Argon welding cable. 1-year warranty with full after-sales service and availability of spare parts.

category_filter: เชื่อมโลหะ
product12.html:
Authorized distributor of argon welding machines with 2 operational modes: TIG and MMA. Compact and portable design, with adjustable voltage (220V). Includes a 5-meter argon welding cable and a 1-year warranty. After-sales service and advice available throughout the product's lifespan, with full spare parts support.

We are a one-stop center for nearly all types of equipment and spare parts. Products are available for sale, and we offer complete repair services for RILON machines. Customers can bring in their products for repair and pick them up immediately, with affordable pricing and professional service, available exclusively at Worachart Group.

product13.html:
MEGMEET Artsen P(C)M500/400F/N/A Ⅱ

  • Model: Artsen PM500F / N / A ⅡArtsen PM500F / N / AR Ⅱ
  • Control mode: Full digital
  • Wire feeding drive control mode: Photoelectric coder feedback + high-speed loop control with chip separation, optional synchronous motor control for remote options
  • Input voltage: 3-phase 380Vac ± (285 ~ 475V)
  • Input frequency: 30 ～ 80 Hz
  • Input capacity: 24KVA (22.3 kW)
  • Power meter: 24KVA (22.3 kW)
  • Efficiency: 87%
  • Rated output voltage: 73.3V
  • Rated output current: 500A 500A 400A 400A / 350A
  • Voltage range: 12 ~ 45V (accuracy 0.1V) 30 ～ 500A 30 ～ 500A 30 ～ 400A 30 ～ 400A
  • Duty cycle: Rated 60% @ 500A @ 40℃ 100% @ 400A @ 40℃
  • Wire diameter φ0.8 / 1.0 / 1.2 / 1.6 / SP mm φ0.8 / 1.0 / 1.2 / SP mm
  • Welding material types F: CS N: CS / SS S: CS / SS / Al CS F: CS N: CS / SS S: CS / SS / Al CS
  • Welding process: MIG / MAG / CO2
  • Dual pulse / Pulse / DC MAG / CO2
  • DC MIG / MAG / CO2
  • Dual pulse / Pulse / DC MAG / CO2
  • DC, 2-step, 4-step, special 4-step and spot welding sequence
  • Arc characteristics: -9 ～ +9
  • Wire feeder parameter display
  • Robot communication: Analog / Net devices / CAN Open / Megmeet CAN / RS-485 / Ethernet / IP
  • Insulation class: IP23S protection level
  • Main machine environmental conditions: Heavy duty -39℃ ~ +50℃, humidity ≤ 95%
  • Dimensions: 300 × 480 × 620 mm
  • Weight: 52 kg

Cooling system (optional configuration)

  • Power: 260W
  • Voltage: 400Vac
  • Coolant volume: 6.5 L
  • Coolant flow rate: 3.5L/min
  • Maximum coolant temperature

product14.html:
Artsen Cm 500C Inverter Welding Machine

  • Full digital control system: The Artsen Cm 500C welding machine uses a high-speed digital system for each step to enhance control efficiency.
  • Independent working panel: Users can customize the operation to improve convenience during work.
  • Stores more than 50 working modes: The system allows users to store their own welding settings and includes a parameter check system to detect errors during each weld.
  • Multiple functionalities: The welding machine has an advanced program system that supports a variety of tasks and can be used with additional equipment.
  • Advanced software: The welding machine features expert-level programming designed for large industries, achieving 100% performance. A dedicated welding program development team ensures constant innovation and cutting-edge technology, making the machine the best, most cost-effective, and modern option available.
  • Pulse welding parameters: The machine allows activation of pulse welding parameters that monitor each step to ensure accuracy and minimize errors, resulting in clear, high-quality welds with reduced workpiece damage.

Technical Specifications

  • Control mode
  • Wire feeding control mode
  • Input efficiency
  • Input capacity
  • Power factor
  • Efficiency
